show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

header.title: More Government Tricks To Get You To Buy Stocks. Don’t!

title: More Government Tricks To Get You To Buy Stocks. Don’t!
content:
A warning about the outrageous decision to modify money market funds so that investors can no longer depend on the... <!--more--> $1/share value.
Please listen to this first piece carefully and act accordingly.
The parallels between the period leading up to the Great Depression and now.
The most significant: the concentration of wealth in just a few hands at that time.
The difference: the very rich at that time acquired their wealth through productive industry (cars, entertainment, steel, oil, etc).
Today’s wealth is overwhelmingly financial-based, creating little or no wealth for society-at-large.
The whys and wherefores of speed limits.
A Cyprus bank held up at gunpoint on orders from the United States.
America’s difficulty with mathematical concepts.
The recent plunge in home sales.
What explains America’s national tendency to invite failure?
Is it an addiction?
Why must we have bubble after bubble?
What’s going on here?
The drought situation is becoming critical, especially in the Colorado River Basin.
